synopsis.text: And so begins the tale of Ooizumi Naoto, a self-conscious high school student and secret writer for the popular TV show, CosPrayers. As he navigates the challenges of working behind the scenes, he finds himself captivated by one of the show's actresses, Yagami Natsumi. As they work together, their relationship blossoms, but not without its fair share of comedic twists and unexpected turns. But as Ooizumi tries to balance his growing feelings for Natsumi and keep his secret under wraps, he must also navigate the affections of the other actresses on set. Will Ooizumi be able to keep his secret safe and win Natsumi's heart, or will the chaos of the set prove too much for him to handle? Only time will tell in this heartwarming and hilarious tale of love and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
